DOC.criteria: Sign inform consent American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) classification : class I~II ; undergo elective surgery patient Aged 18 55 , 4967 kg weight Body Mass Index（BMI）： 2030 kg/m2 Did use analgesic sedative drug within 24 h preoperation Recently patient undergo sedative drug antidepressant treatment Serious vision , hear impairment reason communicate Serious neurological disease , pregnancy , diseases cardiovascular system； BMI Less standard 80 % high standard 120 %
